page.title: 16Education
page.content: {Primary and pre-School} No Nursery School in Storth, but a Mothers and Toddlers Group meets for two half-day sesions each week. Some attend Nursery School in Milnthorpe. The majority of the Primary age children attend Storth Church of England School, which has three teachers and about 60 pupils. On the west of the estuary the children attend nursery groups and junior schools in Levens and Milnthorpe. {Secondary} Storth children attend the Dallam School at Milnthorpe. From the west of the estuary children travel to Dallam or to one of the Kendal schools. {Adult and Further} A few courses are provided in Storth by the WEA. Others are provided by Dallam's Community Education programme. FE and vocational courses are available at Kendal.
